sentences.sContent: If you take a synoptic problem kind of analysis of a lot this stuff that are in some of these speeches in Matthew, a lot of these sayings might have occurred in another context in Luke or in Mark.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you take a synoptic problem kind of analysis of a lot this stuff that are in some of these speeches in Matthew, a lot of these sayings might have occurred in another context in Luke or in Mark.
sentences.sCn: 如果你把对观福音书问题看成,对马太福音中这些讲论的分析，很多词句都出现在,路加或马可福音中，只是背景不同。

synos.tran: [气象]天气的；概要的；对观福音书的

trans.tranCn: 天气的；概要的；对观福音书的
